recognition¶

Implements functionality regarding the recognition of an input grid.

Author: Marek Dohnal

Date: 17/03/2023

recognition._apply_buffer_(grid, fill_buffer)¶

Applies the buffer of changes to the grid.

recognition._fill_down_(grid, start_row, start_col, fill_buffer)¶

Fills the tile down in one layer. Returns modified fill buffer, and end position.

recognition._fill_tile_(grid, start_row, start_col, tile)¶

Fills the current tile, returns modified grid with filled tile and inserts a new tile into the tile array.

recognition._fill_up_(grid, start_row, start_col, fill_buffer)¶

Fills tile up based on input grid. Returns modified fill buffer, and end position.

recognition._find_new_beginning_(grid, start_row, start_col)¶

Finds the beginning of a new tile based on a grid and current position.

recognition._find_new_fill_beginning_(grid, start_row, start_col)¶

Finds new fill beginning (F_B) based on grid and current position

recognition.recognize_tiles(grid, num_of_tiles_on_rows)¶

Recognizes tiles from an input grid and returns them as a 2D array.

Parameters:

  • grid – is the input grid containing tiles,

  • num_of_tiles_on_rows – is a list representing a pattern given, by the number of tiles on rows.

Returns:

array of tiles.

auto-vasarely
